name: To Get The Robot To The Other Side
name_original: To Get The Robot To The Other Side
description:
A Robot needs to pass the robot test to become a fully fledged robot.

But there's a problem... THE ROBOT IS ENTIRELY USELESS.

A Robot that can't move, can't speak, cant think, nothing at all.

SO YOU MUST GUIDE THE ROBOT THROUGH THE TEST MANUALLY.

But How??

WITH BOMBS OF COURSE!!!!

UTILIZE YOUR BOMBS WISELY AND HELP GET THE ROBOT TO THE OTHER SIDE.

Made for The Wowie Jam 4.0
